item.title: A Gentle Guide to Cornflower Varieties
item.description:
‚ÄúSome flowers whisper more than they shout ‚Äî and some women bloom that way too.‚Äù

üåæ Why Cornflowers Feel Like Coming Home

There‚Äôs something healing about Cornflowers ‚Äî those wild flashes of blue that bloom without asking for applause. Known as Centaurea cyanus or Bachelor‚Äôs Button, they once thrived at the edges of wheat fields, bold and quiet all at once.

In many ways, they remind me of women I admire ‚Äî resilient, soft-spoken, deeply rooted.
And on some days, they remind me of myself.
